events.message: I just got into a car accident yesterday afternoon and need to file a claim for the damages to my vehicle.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident after reviewing the initial report and vehicle condition.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your car accident claim and will be your point of contact.
We acknowledge receipt of your car accident claim and have started the preliminary processing of your case.
Please provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and any medical bills if applicable for assessment.
All requested documents including the police report and photos of the collision have been submitted successfully.
The investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence and will inspect the vehicle for further damage analysis.
The investigation regarding your auto claim is complete and the damages have been verified to match the report.
We have prepared a proposed settlement amount for the repair of your vehicle based on the evaluation results.
You provided feedback on the settlement offer, requesting clarification on specific repair cost breakdowns.
Based on your concerns, the claim has been escalated to senior management for review of the settlement terms.
The senior management reviewed the case and approved the settlement offer for your auto accident claim.
Payment covering the approved settlement amount has been issued for the repairs to your vehicle.
Your auto accident claim is now officially closed, and we thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
